de.griefed.serverpackcreator.utilities.versionchecker.github

Class GitHubChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.utilities.versionchecker.VersionChecker
      • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.utilities.versionchecker.github.GitHubChecker

  • public class GitHubChecker
extends VersionChecker
    Check a given repository, by a given user, for updates.
    Versions are checked for semantic-release-formatting. Meaning tags must look like the following examples:
    2.0.0
    2.1.1
    3.0.0-alpha.1
    3.0.0-alpha.13
    1.2.3-beta.1
    and so on.
